title: Ep. 249 - Rebranding The Burqa
description:
Today on the show, does it make sense for feminists to celebrate burqas? Also, an Evangelical leader takes a bold stand, proclaiming that there is no Gospel argument for white supremacy. Except nobody is making a Gospel argument for white supremacy, so what’s the point of declaring something like that? And should we look at historical figures in the context of their times or should we judge them by modern standards? Date: 04-30-2019
